# EAISI ProcessMining

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of EAISI ProcessMining is to apply the process mining techniques 
learner at Eindhoven Artificial Intelligence Systems Institute (EAISI).

These techniques were shown using a free licence of Celonis. This repository aims to apply the same using [bupar](https://bupar.net/) package in R based on SAP data.
